bham.leakiest.infotheory

Class BlahutArimoto

  • java.lang.Object
    • bham.leakiest.infotheory.BlahutArimoto

  • public class BlahutArimoto
extends java.lang.Object
    This class calculates the capacity of a channel using the Blahut-Arimoto Algorithm. The description for this algorithm is largely taken from the paper: "A Generalized Blahut-Arimoto Algorithm" by Pascal Vontobel", N.B. this paper uses natural logs and e where as we are using log2 and 2, to give the capacity in bit.
    Version:
    1.2.5
    Author:
    Tom Chothia, Yusuke Kawamoto

      • calculateError

        public double calculateError(double[] inputProbs_Q,
                             double[][] matrix_W)
        Finds the maximum possible error for a input PMF using:
        I(Q,W) ≤ true Cap ≤ max_x[T(x) -log(Q(x))] i.e. max possible err is max_x[T(x) -log(Q(x))] - I(Q,W).
        Find max_x[T(x) -log(Q(x))] where
        T(x) = Sigma_y W(y|x).log(Q(x).W(y|x) / (QW)(y))
        we take log (0/0) = 0 (as x/x → 1 as x → 0 and log(1) = 0) and n.log 0 = -inf (as n.log(x) → -inf as x → x)
        Parameters:
        inputProbs_Q - input PMF
        matrix_W - channel matrix
        Returns:
        the maximum possible error
